title: Netherfield Must Go
description: Pride and Prejudice- The Remix! Local DJ Liza Bennett has had it with gentrification in her Southeast DC neighborhood. When a brooding property developer sets up shop right next door at Netherfield Court apartments, Liza will do whatever she can to make sure they know they are not welcome. Can she keep her mom and family from undermining her every move against Pemberley Development Co? In this modern, multicultural retelling of Austen's beloved novel, Liza Bennett knows it all- except how to keep arrogant Dorsey Fitzgerald at arms length!
author: Nikki Payne
